     Across the Atlantic,UKstudents have been less troubled by the crisis. Most undergraduates in the DK cover their university expenses with government-funded loans and grants . Their biggest concern is a sudden steep increase in student rent.
     Most young professionals now rent houses, since 80 percent of UK mortgage schemes  have disappeared--a direct result of the credit crisis. This has boosted the house rent market.
